Text: We need the BAME report on COVID-19 now. We need to ensure ALL MPs can vote safely today. We need Boris Johnson to condemn Donald Trump in the strongest possible terms regardless of where this leaves a trade agreement. These 3 things are all absolutely crucial today

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.

Word is Gov delaying report into BAME people and #COVID19 is due to #GeorgeFloydProtests. Surely this movement confronts the lack of urgency in tackling racial inequalities. We must release the report now and act fast. We owe it to those have already passed. #BlackLivesMatterUK
That Book in his hand has all of the answers to the problems we are seeing. That Book is what will save us all. #GodSaveAmerica https://t.co/M6CaMpu32c

A new study by @GlenysCaswell @UoN_SHS  examines why some people die alone and what circumstances can lead to them spending their final days isolated from others - #deathanddying #COVID19 #WeareUoN https://t.co/QDBfiBPZ7Z https://t.co/PhvXjuHOGx

Where is Congress? Where is the Supreme Court? Where are the mayors and governors? Living former presidents? Where are the university presidents, foundation heads, religious leaders, corporate leaders, union heads, editors and publishers? All must stand up to Trump's madness.

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
Trump is the result of just how much parts of America hated a black man being President and the thought of a woman getting the job.That's some hate.

June 1  #COVID19 #Kerala update  Today 57 people tested positive!  27 from abroad, 28 other states, ; 2 primary contactsTotal cases  : 1326Active cases  :   708Total Recoveries  :  608Total deaths          :  10 (1 death today)
